notes: Luxury high-rise apartment in excellent condition with modern finishes, polished tile floors, recessed lighting, and a well-appointed bathroom with glass-enclosed shower and bathtub. The building has an impressive hotel-style lobby with chandelier and lounge area, confirming elevator access. Baby safety considerations: hard tile floors throughout, glass shower enclosure in bathroom, and unfurnished open layout would need childproofing but no obvious hazards like stairs or low balcony railings visible.
